page.title: 16Old Games and Sayings.
page.content: People used to rely a lot on clouds, wind and other elements for the weather. News didn't travel very fast because there was no T.V. or radio.If smoke went up from the chimneys it was a sign of good weather but if it was blowing about or going down chimneys it was a sign of bad weather. They relied a lot on animals too. If the cat sat with its back to the fire, it was a sign of cold weather.On the 29th of May children used to look for new oak balls to put in their buttonholes. If they didn't the others got nettles and went round thrashing their legs. They used to play many games like 'Sheep, Sheep, Come Home', Hopscotch, and quite a few singing games such as 'Oranges and Lemons' and 'Poor Jane Sat a Weeping' and many others.
